metadata.title: CVE-2024-30917 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in eProsima FastDDS v.2.14.0 and before, allows alocal attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) and obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted history_depth parameter in DurabilityService QoScomponent.

criterions.comment: fastdds package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
